page.title: 10The Guides
page.content: Stallingborough Guides meet every Tuesday at 7:15 to 8:30 in the village hall.There are two patrols,Swallow and Chaffinch.There are ten guides altogether and we have one leader.At guides we go for walks,play games and once we did country dancing.Last week we went on a five mile walk.We do a lot of tracking.That is where one patrol goes ahead leaving signs for the other patrol to follow. One week we had a tuck shop for the other patrol to raise funds for our patrol. Also we invite people to come and give us talks.We invited a blind man with his guide dog to talk to us the other week.Besides doing activities like that we can also work for badges like sewing and cooking.Some of us are going to guide camp this year.I don't know what it's like as I've not been.
